local_intent: Ensure grape is visible, move to a safe pre-grasp height above it, and verify arrival.
assumptions: IsAt(target=grape) is acceptable to confirm arrival at the pre-grasp pose above the grape.
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT approach phase: visibility fallback (IsObjectVisible/ScanForTarget) followed by MoveAbove; adds verification with IsAt without altering semantics.
